title: La Favorita - Leith
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Sit-down restaurant with an attached pizza delivery & takeaway. Began offering vegan rice milk cheese in late-2014 - ask for it. Note that while the standard pizza base is vegan, the gluten-free one contains egg. Be specific when order as staff might use parmesan in your order.
